proposal: Ever pondered how donkeys, those unsung heroes of history, mirror the resilience and utility in the crypto world? Donke does, blending homage and innovation with a nod to Matt Furie's design ethos. With 288 holders on the ETH network, it's clear the community values this blend of history and creativity. Our tools, like DEX and Lottery, are here to further empower your community, enabling anyone to contribute and benefit. Let's harness the steadfast spirit of the donkey together.
